SEARCH
Package be.brahms.rent_serve.services.impl

Class CategoryServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
be.brahms.rent_serve.services.impl.CategoryServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CategoryService
@Service public class CategoryServiceImpl extends Object implements CategoryService
Service implementation for managing category. Uses CategoryRepository to perform database operations.
